abstracts.cdata!:
The project would rehabilitate and
            replace existing port infrastructure and equipment and help
            strengthen the autonomous and well-organized port authority
            at Conakry, thus removing constraints making the port a
            bottleneck to Guinea's economic development. It
            provides rehabilitation and repair of quays, port buildings,
            and transport and navigation equipment, and management,
            accounting and planning technical assistance to PAC.
